author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ISAAC FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
summary:
...ISAAC FORECAST TO STRENGTHEN OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS...
 As of 11:00 AM AST Thu Sep 26
 the center of Isaac was located near 37.3, -51.7
 with movement E at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 997 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Isaac (AT5/AL102024)
